title: A Cautionary Tale on the Dangers Deploying AI in Social Media

components.name: open_quote
components.text: Forget artificial intelligence - in the brave new world of big data, it's artificial idiocy we should be looking out for.

components.name: intro_text
components.content: In August 2018, several major tech companies including YouTube, Facebook, and Apple, banned {Alex Jones}, the infamous radio talk show host best known for spreading conspiracy theories, from their platforms. It was a rare display of content moderation
